content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my yard with my wife. nice clear night. playing with our dog, looking at stars. we see satellites often. this wasn't a satellite or a an identifiable aircraft.  i've been to many air shows and i'm familiar with military and commercial aircraft, as a remote interest.

in my left peripheral, i noticed a loan single slow-strobing light slowly ascending at about an 85 degree trajectory. its lone dull white light would gradually fade on and off in roughly 2 second intervals.  it did this the entire time i watched it ascend out of sight and into the clear black night/stars, which was a little over a minute.

the light was larger than stars while it was low in altitude but shrank as it ascended into the stars.    

once i realized it wan't a plane, or a satellite i called my wife's attention to it and we watched it ascend together for probably 30 to 40 seconds before it became too high to further see with the naked eye and disappeared among the stars.

my wife then went inside. i stayed out staring up in wonder.  as soon as my wife went inside. a bright blue streak (electric looking in nature or like the blue color of a welding arc) 

it lit up left to right and shot across the entire sky in front of me, and over the south shore/ocean.  it was only a split second. it startled me and caused me to gasp and call for my wife to come back out but she didn't hear me and then it was gone.  i want to say i heard a noise but i'm not sure i could describe it.

it was so bright blue, and straight. its ends just stopped unlike lightning. it had to be at least a 1/4 mile or longer. perfectly straight blue streak with no breaks in it.  like a fluorescent light tube across the sky. 

it appeared and was gone within 2 seconds. this wasn't lightning. i've seen lots of lightning. there was no lightning in the area that night.  the night was a clear summer night.

thanks
content.summary: 1 white slow strobing or pulsating light ascending out of sight then another blue fast and straight streak light. almost flourescent in nature.

content.detailedDescription:
While in my front yard i saw an amber lighted orb 500 meters away moving northwest toward the southeast
it was high and came down lower over my house
there were no clouds in the sky, the orb pulsed and then turned blue with a white center with a blue dot in middle 
it made no noise and was moving steady and slowly 1000 feet in the air 
the orb appeared 50 feet in diameter, like a small airplane only lower as it flew by flashing different figures and faces on it like a panorama of a kind
it appeared animated or something you would draw and was not human   
they appeared reptilian all different colors of eyes
 blue, black,purple and green 
i got dizzy and got a high pitch ringing in my ears
this is the sighting i made a video of

since then i have had many sightings  
early morning in the clear sky they look like little stars and move in clock wise motions and when i flash a flashlight at them, they flash back a white light
usually between 4 and 5 in morning  
several fly in clock wise direction and fly around
 
fog appears near ufos in the clear sky 
there is a military base near by
content.summary: Saw an amber lighted orb slowly fly by

my car  black shadow i  first thougth  it was someone that broke in my car quickly i get out and say what are you doing in my car wen i went around my car and focus closely  i was paralise for a cuple of second and it was some type of reptilian looking thing  i  step back and suddenly  like static  lightning  it desapear in front of my eyes everything happened inside my car  everything was dark. streets by there  i was really scare waited a cupple of min  looked inside my car and nothing was there i emedietly  gat in my car and left to my house.  next week told my co workers  and that was it.  some month pass by  something similar happened but. this time  i was driving. of work get on  the palmetto expressway  ramp. 36 st   heading south  in the same. area.   a static orb size of a basketball inside my car next to me in the passenger sit i c  the same. reptilian. type. thing. coming out of the static ball  and   it sounded like a tv with no signal ssshhhh.  and out of nowhere  my rigth front tire blows up and the thing just desapear  i panic no one around againg get off change the tire scare out of my mind i change tire  and  drove home.  all the way to my house the passenger sit was warmer then  the car with the a/c on. till this day i have nightmares of that day and  i cant explain what it was  ever since my friend  took pictures and cougth  the face of the thing he was so afraid that. he thinks it was something demonic he stoped going to the  site  i pray everyday before going to work  to calm  me down  and take pictures at work constantly to c if i c anything and a lot of wierd. stuff do come out  in the pictures  i saved  one picture of an alien bihind a tree  in the club and other  stuff.  i have witness of. people that had seen the pictures  and they are impress  the picture that i have is in a phone not on a file im going to try to make a file but i dont know if is posible
content.summary: It was an alien in back of my car also bihind a tree an a reptilian type of something came out of a static  blue green orb

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:50pm on 4/4/14 when i turned off the tv and was thinking about work when something caught my attention out of the corner of my eye to the right.  i looked up toward the large window over the living room windows and saw what appeared to be a fire ball.  i got up and went to the windows.  it was traveling south to north, heading towards my location at a steady speed.  it was not windy out.  
	it was a glowing red circle or orb, it did not emit smoke, it did not leave a tail.  i just stood watching it come closer and closer and was mesmerized by what it was so much so that i didn���t want to stop watching it to get my cell to take a video.  it made no sound.  it was approx. one story above the one story houses.  at it���s closest point to me, approx. 30 feet from me, it appeared to be between the size of a basket ball to a 3 foot circle which means it would have been larger in person.  it went between my house and the neighbors house at a steady speed.  i ran to the north side of the house and watched it continue north, it had already appeared on the north side of the houses and was traveling faster than i ran.  i did not feel threatened by this object at this point in time.  it appeared to be a red swirling ball of glowing gaseous liquid, but it was traveling at a constant speed and at a constant distance above the earth.  it appeared to be searching for something, or perhaps observing stuff.  i watched it disappear out of sight.  
	i was hoping to see others, so i grabbed my phone, used the bathroom, and turned off the house alarm so i could go outside if i saw another one.  i went back and forth from the north to the south sides of the house looking out the windows to see if there were others.  then at about 11:03 pm, i saw what appeared to be the same red glowing orb traveling from the north back south along the same exact path.  i activated my cell phone video but it���s shaky and the object appeared so small on the video compared to what i saw with my eyes.  all of a sudden i got an eery feeling because it seemed to be coming right at me and slowing down.  i decided to go outside to see it i could get a better video of it.  at this point, i am concerned as to not only what it is, buy why is it heading back toward me? as i walk outside and hold my cell up the object started traveling north away from me again.  at this point i am spooked.  i didn���t want to go outside, but feeling no threat and hearing no sound from the object i thought i could just get a video of it as it went over me.  however, as i hold up my cell phone, the object starts rapidly traveling north again.  
	i feel that it saw me and didn���t want to be taped.  the second video does not even show the object, despite my eyes seeing it.  during this time, there were no small planes in the area, but after watching it disappear out of sight the second time, i saw a small plane in the distance by the vero beach airport.  i saw planes over the house earlier in the evening, they never fly that low, and i can always hear them.
	i have 2 videos and have taken still pictures from the first video. i have also taken a video from the same window of a plane flying over for comparison.
i wish to remain anonymous due to my being a professional person who deals with the public in this area and area south of here.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red fiery orb over house

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work at 5:20 am on hwy64 westbound around washington park. spotted a large triangular object hovering just under the clouds. it was still twilight so the only thing i could see was the orange glow of the light being omitted from the craft which was three lights. one large bar and two orbs to the "rear". it was facing north east then pivoted east tilted 20 degrees and rose through the clouds. this lasted for about 5 min. also judging by distance and height compared to the st. louis arch it must have been a mile in diameter.
content.summary: Seen hovering over south st.Louis just under clouds then pivoted and rose through clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
my dad saw it first from the backyard and moved to the front yard to see it.
7-8 round white objects floating along in the sky. two jets were in the sky. one really far ahead and the other one appeared just before the white objects. it had its own trail and appeared to be a bit lower but it appeared the objects were trailing it. they appeared to float along a bit of a distance from the jet because they didn't come in contact with the jets trail. they didn't appear to be birds. they were round and white. i left before they disappeared from view.  i don't know what they were. it was strange to see them appear so close to where the jet was flying. i don't think they came from it because they appeared to be a bit higher or off to the side of it. they were both quite high and could have been dismissed as birds or balloons except they appeared to be trailing the jet.
content.summary: 7-8 round white objects floating along in the sky. two jets were in the sky. one really far ahead and the other one appeared just before the white objects. it had its own trail and appeared to be a bit lower but it appeared the objects were trailing it.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room asleep. i woke up, it was a little past 3 am. i did not see an object, i was awaken by a strange feeling, almost like before you are in a panic state. i heard something heavy on the roof above me, the tiles where making noise as it moved. i was not sure what to make of the noise. i thought it could be an owl or hawk possibly given the area i live in. it did not feel right though. as i started paying more attention. i noticed that my room was getting darker and darker, this made no sense to me, it was 3am how could my room possibly be getting darker. almost immediately this feeling of dread and extreme discomfort started taking over me, i told myself this is enough. you are tired, this is just your mind playing games. so i turned over in my bed to face the wall. the intensity in the room could be cut with a knife. i could not shake this over baring feeling like i was not alone in my room. some how i manage to fall asleep and i wish i hadn't. i start to wake up again. this time its different, i feel extremely groggy, the feeling you get when you are waking up from anesthesia. i can hear voices but i am not coherent enough to make out the sound. i am trying to open my eyes to see anything but nothing is happening, i am blind. my next thought is to try to move, i cant. i am stuck to what feels like a table. what struck me though is i felt no straps or ties. during my attempt to move i noticed the voices stop. i hear heavy steps coming from my back right shoulder. before i can do anything else something very strong grabs me by the jaw and top of my head and forces my mouth shut. the pressure was so great i thought my teeth were going to crack. i hear a loud pop, my first and last thought was this thing just shattered my teeth and jaw, i noticed a chock like foamy taste in my mouth before i black out. when i awake the next day. i feel absolutely horrible. my face feels like it took a pummeling. my body was in shock and i proceed to puke. when i am in the bathroom, to my amazement, there is not a single mark or scratch on my body despite the horrific pain i was in. this is not my first experience but my my most traumatic. it's been on going since childhood.
content.summary: Started to wake up,felt bound,was blind, before i could become fully aware, heard foot steps,grabbed by the jaw forced to bite down on something, blacked out. on going since childhood

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were outside at around 7 pm, i go to a music studio in denton texas. we were in the parking lot getting into the car and it started to get really foggy and misty suddenly.  then as if floating out of some nearby trees two black triangle craft came out of the mist and slowly went over our heads, they did have a large bowl like light underneath that dimly flashed,  they also were the same footage above our heads as the 1 story roof of the music building. the triangles were so close to the building they could have slammed into it. another person in the parking lot must have seen them, she just quickly looked away and got in her car. my mom and i watched as they slowly without a noise floated across a nearby street and faded back into the heavy fog. later as we drove home we saw three more heading in the same direction at a higher elevation, other people must have seen these.  the place they seemed to be heading for was the denton fema headquarters. sorry but this is the most disturbing part of the whole experience,why there?
content.summary: Heavy mist came down 2 black triangles with random flashing large lights underneath, they were the size of a large backyard the mist hide them slightly. myself and other saw 3 other triangle ufos going to the same location 30 minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were stargazing(on our backs),looking for meteors in woodsville, nh; at about 1030 at night.At first we thought we saw a small plane coming. as the object got close and noticed it didn't sound like an airplane and it was flying much lower then one too. it made a soft humming sound. it had three bright rotation white lights in a triangle shape. it traveled from the sw to ne in a direct line over us. it continued ne till be lost site of it. the whole thing happen in about 2 to 3 mins.I don't think we realized what we saw till after it had passed us.We got to see meteors and then some!
content.summary: Rotating lights in the shape of a triangle

content.detailedDescription: Summer of 99, i was hanging outside of a small apt complex in milan illinois with a couple friends of mine talking shooting the breeze. i notice that night the sky's were clear, and the stars seem like a painted back ground. out the blue i heard a neighbor drinking beer, say what the .... is that in the sky a helicopter, so we all look.From a distance it was possible it could have been. suddenly you couldn't ignore the object coming closer with these clear white bright circle lights.With in seconds everybody stop speaking and was observing the same circle object 40-50 feet from us,the object size was pretty big.It amaze me how close an steal it was with no sound at all.Then suddenly it shoots up to space quick, quiet,and gently.I thought i was seeing things cause i never encounter anything like that in life.At one point i thought i was drinking tell i ask my friend next to me and he replied no,and i said let's go and we left and everybody went into there homes like disbelief
content.summary: Scary

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Dropping off children at bus stop, different in the sky,   airplane, star,   it changed shape, in the daytime four days later it spinned like an atom, night time all kinds of colors, looked like it was in the trees and it was, the game camera in the woods took two pic, down by the creek, you cud see thru it, taken back in oct. 2013 and there's more, about things in a book i've been working on for thirty years. got videos and some good pictures, its been hanging around for months and we got more videos just a few days ago, called county and state police got the two step.  there was an exciting time and still is, niece was scared when she seen the shadow go across the video. the game cam has the image also. the neighbors about a mile away, the way the crow flys, sent pic, and said they seen a ufo over our place two weeks before we got videos and pic.  its still here my niece got more videos a few days ago.  four people with different cameras have got pictures.
content.summary: The cherry on top for my book

content.detailedDescription: Im a musician. on my way home from a show my now ex wife and myself stopped the car and observed a huge triangular craft, lighted on all sides that we could see with an orange/gold light. made no sound but you could feel it. we watched it for quite a while, what seemed like a half hour but must have been more like three hours (due to the time we actually got home)  after a while i felt like we better get out of there, can't really explain why, but i knew it was time to leave. has haunted me since that day. hopefully sharing will give me some relief. never lost sight of it, just kinda knew to leave.
content.summary: Large illuminated triangle. seen on my way home from work early morning. couldn't stop looking at it.

content.detailedDescription: Im a musician. on my way home from a show my now ex wife and myself stopped the car and observed a huge triangular craft, lighted on all sides that we could see with an orange/gold light. made no sound but you could feel it. we watched it for quite a while, what seemed like a half hour but must have been more like three hours (due to the time we actually got home)  after a while i felt like we better get out of there, can't really explain why, but i knew it was time to leave. has haunted me since that day. hopefully sharing will give me some relief. never lost sight of it, just kinda knew to leave.
content.summary: Large illuminated triangle. seen on my way home from work early morning. couldn't stop looking at it.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving down a neighborhood street when i observed a light in the sky. my friend is extremely into ufo's so when i saw it i immediately pointed and told him to look. at first i thought it was an airplane,  but it didn't travel in a straight line. as we drove towards it, it seemed to turn our was. so i thought it was maybe a helicopter. then it turned away and started going upwards. we then spotted a second object in the sky. by this time the first object looked be rolling and bouncing up and down. a red ball of flame, it was shooting flame. a beautiful red flame. alot was going on but we managed to get my phone out, park on the side of the rode and record enough to see object number 2 shoot a fireball out. then they both seemed to ascend into the skies. both looking like balls of flames that were burning out.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering light in the sky. sometimes red in color. shooting fire. sometimes looking like a ball of fire. blue light flying by. seemed to burn out and fly away.

content.detailedDescription: At approx 11 pm a green & yellow fireball fell from the sky .I thought it was a falling star but it made it all the way to the ground. huge flames. within a couple minutes a black helicopter landed in the mountain pass near the object.When i got off work at 1am i have to go that way home. state troopers had the entrance to 215 north at st.Rose pkwy blocked off also the whole right lane of traffic. there was a unmarked white semi backed into the mountain pass area just past the southern highlands stone markers.They were loading something into the semi. i didnt report it because i thought with all the action it was already reported. tonight i got home and watched your ufo crash special but no word on las vegas. they obviously knew it was comin down and recovered it. i wish i knew what it was.
content.summary: Green /yellow fireball fell all the way to ground 215/st rose ne intersection next to southern highlands golf course,then helicopter.At 1am cleanup was still occuring white semi , troopers blocked roadway next to

content.detailedDescription: Just wanted to add to report i left a while back at fairwood golf corse in renton just watched your program about secret aircraft gov has it fits discription i seen exactly except no color lights corner of triangle craft had orb or round looking pods with slit down middle of corner the whole craft refleted the sky just seen out line of craft it was following small craft into boing ariport in renton no noise it was like slipping through air about fifteen hundred feet behind small craft me and one other guy seen this craft at same time and mentioned thst he had seen this many times before i do not know if he still lives in complex next to practice corse where i picked practice balls at night i no longer work for company i did ask friend who works at air field in radar and got silent treatment from him and was told to shut my mouth and stop talking crazy hmm really thank for ufo files love the program i wish i had taken pic had camera with me darn it
content.summary: Triangle shaped with looks like lights at each corner but transparent

content.detailedDescription:
This is only my second sighting but i think it is the most exciting one. ive never told anyone, due to being called crazy and such, so this is my first time writing my story so bare with me =)

it was about 1 am on a really clear night in the valley and my girlfriend and i had a couple glasses of wine and relaxed in the backyard on some blankets looking up at the stars. my girlfriend falls asleep and annoyingly i am wide awake. i am on my back looking straight up and for some reason i keep finding myself looking at a particular set of stars in a triangle shape. they didn't seem any different than any other star in the sky. but for some reason i lay there scanning the sky while wide awake and keep finding myself scanning back to those 3 stars. i have been following mufon for years now and its a habbit of mine to always keep an eye on the sky, just incase, and still nothing was different about these 3 stars but i was almost compelled to watch them. i finally doze off for maybe an hour and i wake to my eyes being fixed once again on them and i can't stop thinking them. at least an hour goes by and im watcing planes go by and playing with my cat and i suddenly get a strange burst of emotion and feel again compelled to look at those stars. i was happy. it felt crazy strange but i starting smiling and feeling a ton of joy and as i watched them, the star on the bottom right starts to drift to the right. i moved slow but not in a straight line. it would move upwards and then downwards but never and jolts of movement. i followed it through the sky for about 45 seconds and it never changed shape. just looked like a star. i was nearly in tears by the time i lost it over my house. 
the more i think about it i feel that whatever entity that was in control of the object wanted me to see it. its hard to explain the feeling i had when i was compelled to watch it. i have researched many many sightings but not often do i hear of sightings like this so it is exciting to share it all with you!
the truth is out there!
content.summary: Stationary star-like object drifting away.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend took me to see where he started working. as we were pulling out of the parking lot, i seen an airplane with three white pulsating lights trailing behind it. we quickly got out of the car to get a better look. i knew whatever was behind the plane was not anything i've seen before. i tried to quickly get a picture or video but did not show up on my screen. it was too dark. the plane flew behind clouds with the ufo close behind it. i couldnt see the plane for about 30 seconds but re-appeared again after the clouds. the ufo seemed to take more time to go through the clouds. i thought it may have vanished. i was excited to see it still following the plane. the plane and ufo disappeared as they got to far away. right when we couldn't see them anymore, cops came to see what we were doing. i did not tell them what we had just seen.
content.summary: Ufo with three pulsating lights following an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
We heard voices telling us a helicopter would fly by low and land down the street and it did. probably right down the street at about the only location we realy know about there. someone used to spook us when we walked by that house as a kid. the aliens seem to remind us recently of things that we had thought of and forgot. they help you to remember the scary things so you can forget them because when we originally thought of them we forgot without thinking of it and becoming unscared of it. it was something scary and they helped us remember it so we wouldn't be scared no more so we can put it out of our minds. 
so, the helicopter flew real real low by the house someone told us on the  phone day before yesterday. it had happened the day before and they had just got a real real weird phone call about 15 minutes before we called. it had real real weird static on the line they said and they hung up. it wasn't usual and hadn't happened ever before. don't know what color the helicopter was or much on how the call sounded. they said the helicopter flew real real low and the call was real real weird though. they said it was an airlift because of a car crash. they said it landed down the street first - flew weird though. the car crash idea was probably just something they thought of to make sense of it. it surely wasn't one and at first they just said that it was a real weird helicopter flying strange and landed. they didn't mention a car crash. didn't mention the main road. they mentioned a weird flying helicopter is what it was. and nothing of any cars or anything like that- just that it had landed. so the other story of the car wreck and air-lift was not realy what it was. 
we thought of a helicopter that flew by here low recently and voices said they'd make one fly low there, too. they said it'd be the hells angles outlaw motorcycle gang- just like flew by here many times very low outside our window. that is how they do death threats- they are a mafia organization. so, then the voices said aliens fly by and land down street in helicopter and you just think of an air lift due to a car crash would be why they'd land like that. helicopters landed down the street here before, too. but the voices said landing there and aliens or mafia and that they knew a car wreck would happen or they would cause it to happen. realy, it may have been aliens or else the hell's angel's mafia organization maybe - perhaps possessed by aliens and landed there. don't know what it looked like or what the occupant's looked like. it landed so that is unusual. the call was weird- at same time the mafia calls there daily which would be when we woke up the day before. they call and tell lies on the phone because that is mafia activity. they lie on the phone and tell them the same things we said the day before at the same time we said them the day before. it is meant to make them trust them- sound familiar to the person so they trust a stranger. the hell's angel's do lot's of murders for money and that is what that is. they work with other mafia organizations, too such as georgia mafias which is what some of them are out there. so, the aliens called the next day, too and did weird noises on the phone. static maybe copying that song by the band who did 'love shack' because we thought of that song other day, too. maybe aliens put the song in our mind. b-52's is the band name. channel z song- maybe we used to think the song was ufo's or something related to it like ufo's contating you telepatically. the aliens may have reminded us of that idea that we'd never have remembered otherwise. don't know if we ever thought that realy. or we used to think tv's were weird or something- like the film poltergeist. the voices maybe were helping us forget soemthign that scared us though by reminding us that we thought of it and forgot it before we calmed down over it. so we could remember it and forget it. so they landed and just basically also annoying us with voices and scaring us. it was a helicopter, but it maybe was aliens and it landed- don't know if it was black. rape is associated with a ufo landing spot where an alien was sighted in the vicinity. it landed and one was sighted apparently at least. if it was the mafia or not we don't know, but that itself is ufo related because it's alien related because aliens have something to do with a gang that kills thousands of innocent people every year - mostly in the southern us. they work with other mafia organizations, too though a whole lot- we know because we have seen them. and they are international, too a-lot we know because we have seen that, too. we'll have to ask about the color of the helicopter and what the occupant/s looked like. 
they abdolutely did not at first say it was a car crash and air-lift via helicopter. they said it flew by real real low! it had landed down the street! and all you could figure out is why they'd do that would be an air-lift to the hospital from a car crash maybe on the main road. why else would it be there? is it legal to land personal helicopters wherever you want like that? in a residential neighborhood and flying that low- they said it was terribly low. we've seen low planes before because we have seen ufo's before and aliens flying low. this was even lower apparently. 
real real weird static on the phone the next day and they hung up the phone they said. so it's not normal and it does not even sound like a prank call. i have got calls from et's before and here we have stopped answering the phone. the alien/s called maybe just to freak us out seems like and they may have been ordered to phone us up from time to time like it's their job by a top alien. we heard a voice saying they'd be a weird call and there was- with static real weird on it- and it was. the day before we had tried to call out there and they were on the phone to the mafia. the mafia calls and lies and tells them things we said day before at the same time they call there the next day. it's to gain trust and they had called and were on the phone lieing to them out there to make them think they have something in common with them- to sound familiar so they will put their guard down and trust them when they shouldn't. so calling people like that would cause et's to get there because the mafia is doing very violent type of thing by doing that. et's being evil have something to do with it. so there's the mafia and also we don't usually call out there and we recalled that. aliens maybe wanted to remind us of that and how bad it was coz they hate us out there of course. we had to call though because there was important business needed done and you can't do it in 2 minutes once a week here in town realy. we had to do things about buying groceries, clothes and everything and we had to call. they maybe wanted to remind us - did we get mad and freak out and say we weren't calling and to remind us to calm down over whatever we maybe thought on that whole thing if we heard voices on it or whatever. 
i heard about it via the voices 1st, they saw it and surely many others saw it there in the town. aliens could fly a helicopter and even abduct people or animals onto them and make people think it was an air-lift.
content.summary: Helicopter flew low by house then landed down street and weird phone call the next day bout same time in daytime in neighborhood

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
During a short dog walk spotted a large fireball in the north sky. we live in destin, fl and the town is surrounded by water on both north and south side. the object was hoovering less than a mile from earth surface. at first glance we thought it was a street light from the end of the street, but when we got closer it was way bigger than the street lights and it was maybe 5-10 miles away from us. the object had yellow-orange-red color and it appear to glow, wasn't moving at all. it was on the north side of destin/miramar beach.
the object was hovering over water between destin and niceville. it was stationary and after 3 minutes the light turned off with no sound and no trail.

two days later around 20:30 (8:30pm)i saw the same light and i was able to drive closer to it. i was in miramar beach and drove to the north bank of the bay. i was on north holiday road and drove to the water. the object was hoovering above the water less than a mile in the air and maybe 5-7 miles away from me. while looking at it second object left and lower from it appeared (if the first object is presented as a center of a clock, the second object appeared at 7:00 o'clock). both objects were glowing fire balls, with no outside flames. both objects were stationary and hovering with no sound. than after 2-3 minutes the second object dissapeared and than i left the scene, while the first object was still there.
content.summary: Glowing fireball in the sky above water, 2 days later saw 2 of the same fireballs

content.detailedDescription:
Just an inquiry about the percentage of "cat's eyes" normally occurring in the human race, and not having anything to do with aliens.

with all the research mufon has done on what is "normal" vs. "what cannot be explained", i am hoping you can give me a solid answer one way or another.  i met & chatted with this being 3-4 times and then he never again appeared either at the school or at off site locations.  i had 3-4 friends with me each time this occurred, commented to them "wow-what a weird pupil shape and only on his left eye".  they did not seem too "surprised" nor "concerned"!

just of note i do believe in alien beings living amongst us.  i have experienced 3 out of body experiences (at age 7 when i had polio, contracted by getting the salk vaccine), probably not induced/caused  the last one, when i was floating 5 ft. over my body looking down my mom had rushed into my bedroom, looked up at met and said "tommy, get back in there", and in blink of an eye i did just that.

if any of the above could be helpful to your research or to any of our (not alien) population please feel free to share it, copy it to other humans, and offer contacting me for the details and perhaps help each other in the quest to know more about aliens existence.

tommy gordon,
content.summary: Want to know, # of humans with (1) eye's pupil opens like a cat's eye in human race, meaning this trait happens to non-aliens

content.detailedDescription: Was hanging with a friend. saw an orange light zoom past behind his head. it was moving faster than anything i've ever seen before.

I was a c141 flight engineer  in
air force reserves  working off duty at macdonald douglas aircraft i left work at 1210   to sannbernardino ca approching grand terrace ca i saw two ht lights ahead abo ve      the  freeway at frist i thought it was two c141s out of norton afb. flying in formation as i got closer i realized the lights wernt moving i thought maybe two choppers as i crested  the hill i thought somethings wrong so i pulled to the side of the road wond down my window the lightes were almost above me i put my head out the window shut off my engine no sound at all. i got of the car. that when i saw a third light abought a half mile to the west. the light where connected to a huge float tringale flat black 3 storyies high it was hard to see against the dark sky  and the bottom seamed to be miorring the sky above i stood  and watched  it for abought 5min. at fist i thought maybe  aira blimp as it floated to the west or maybe a halogram. i started to get worried what is this .1	2 years  in the air force never  saw an air craft like this as i pulled away i saw it shoot off to the south west .It seemed like the star ship enterprize
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 to 6  city blocks each side

content.detailedDescription: I live in maine. i was heading to my daughters house at 6:30pm. she only lives 5miles from me. it was just getting dark at this time of year. . as i was passing the lake i noticed this craft just hovering about 20/25feet above the lake water. so i stop to watch it. at first i thought that it was a hot air balloon. then i realized no sound and no flames. it was dark in color; triangle in shape; then the lights came on; i noticed it had 3round dome shape with blueish glow lights coming from them; each was apprx. 3to5foot in diameter and appx 1to2foot thick at it's center peak of the dome underneath the craft. and a smaller dome in the center with that being a white glow.  on top it saw only one greyish/white glow dome apprx 10plus feet in diameter with a high dome. it was just hovering their. then one of the bottom dome lights went brighter blueish/green light and it seem like it was taken in water. it moved very slowly and never a sound was made. i would say that that the thickness of the craft would be around 10/15feet and the sides 50/80feet in length..The brighter light went back to it's orginal color. then it started to move very slowly up; when it got little higher than the trees it started slowly turning away from me; over the trees as it got higher; made acouple small turns; then it started to point it's nose up; the in a blink if not quicker it was gone. i felt a strong breeze right after. then i notice in the far distance just a steady white speck of light moving fast in a northern direction; then from a straight line it took what it look like a right angle direction then gone. then i went to my daughters. it seemed like a short time but when i got to my daughters house; hours had passed it was almost 9:45pm. my daughter asked me what took me so long..I told her what i saw at the lake.  but then 3days later at my house; it was late midnight/one am. i took my dog outside to do what she needed to do. she started to act funny going in circles (like chasein' her tail) and looking up in the night sky. when i looked up; their was that triangle craft again. about 75/100feet above me. now whether it was the same craft from the lake i don't know. but i really feel deep down it's safe to say that it was. it was in total darkness; all i could see was the outline of it against the night sky. then suddenly from the center dome a whiteish/blue light shined down upon me. then the nexts thing i was inside my house and it was 3:15am. i felt lost;beside myself;little sore this time under my arms;but all in all wondered if or when they'd comeback and this time let me see and remember all...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed as passing a near by lake..A trangle shape craft..Apprx 25feet above the lake..Hovering..Having a wide beam of light shining onto the water..It seem like water was being drawn up into it..Appx 5min. it took off slowly got higher then zoom gone

content.detailedDescription: We had no bathroom or running water. to use the "bathroom" at night, we had a "pot" on our back porch. i went there.  no lights on, no lights in the country. i am 61 now, 14 at the time i saw this. i thought it was a meteor. it had no tail and was traveling at a medium/slow speed, the color was yellow/orange.  it traveled in a straight line over the trees by the blue ridge parkway. i knew little of meteors and nothing of ufo's. there was no sound. it never wavered, just kept going straight until it was out of my sight. i told my parents the next morning, they thought it was funny, that i had really not seen it. over the years i have thought about this incident. i wonder what i really saw. the object was very large, and round. my i.Q. is 143. i use no words that might perhaps confuse anyone. my feelings at that age was wonder. the only other person i have told about this is my husband. for a long time now, i have not believed this was a meteor.
content.summary: The object was round, large, going at a medium speed, no tail, going straight over blue ridge parkway, medium orange yellow, perfectly round.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my friends dog on the night of may 19 2012, on the corner of linderman ave and hayes ave, when to the north above same house in 2010 encounter 1 orb appeared and shot downwards at me. within 30 feet of me, it communicated with its mind stating we needed help. so i took dog back to garage to get my friend again. we both went to alley to observe all 5 orbs which in the darkness they were so bright u could not miss them. being the second time we witnessed them,they scattered in different directions. one shot straight up threw a cloud, making a perfect circle in it and at a high rate of speed disapered in to the darkness. i was surprised at first to see them again, my friend was surprised as well. since i have seen them on the 17  of 2010 and 19 of 2012 im hoping they will back on the 21 of may 2014 this year, ill bring a digital camera this time. you are welcome to join me if u want, give me a call
content.summary: I was walking a friends dog, when to the north i spotted 1 orb over house when it dropped down flew within 30 feet of me and communicated with me stating we need help

content.detailedDescription: It's hard for me to talk about i just want to know if there are others who have seen the same thing?   this thing allowed me to see it..  it was blinding bright for me to look at my eyes teared from how bright it was. my girlfriend was in the room when it happened but she could not see anything. i was in a altered conscious state.  i was floating in the cosmos i remember telling her i wish you could see this.. the colors they're so beautiful all the stars and galaxies were right in front of my face clear as day i was mentally in outer space but was able to have a conversation about everything i saw. then i snapped out of it  and it was next to me just observing me... so bright i don't understand what i saw i closed my eyes and opened them again it was still there. it had a glass helmet that looked how the glass on a astronaut  helmet looks like i could not see in it was a goldfish very reflective and very bright. it had a good mechanical looking suit .. the more i looked at it and tried to make sense of what i was seeing  the more my eyes would tear up from a very very bright  glow coming off of this person. i swear to you on my soul and on my dead brothers soul. this is no story and no lie it has crushed me and my previous way of seeing things.
content.summary: Robot bien  was in a different state of reality it had a golden suit had a helmet  very similar to that of robby the robot and had eyes identical to that of the man on star trek  with the cyclops looking  eyes

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around 9 at night when i looked up at the stars i i always do  i can point out mars and jupiter when i saw two orange orbs moving to the north not real fast but fast enough that it caught my attention.  one orb went straight up which looked like it headed east but it got smaller and smaller till it was gone like it left the atmosphere .With only one orb remaining it stopped the it to went straight up but not after hanging around a min like it was watching me the it to went straight up and it got smaller and smaller and it was gone i turn to go home still looking up and around when i turn around it was back no man made object can move that fast with out making noise i believe that i have been a witness to a ufo with it still hoveringbi ran home to get binoculars and my phone to get a photo of it i told my dad what i saw we went out back and looked in tje last direction and it was gone i know the government is coving this up we are not alone
content.summary: Noticed 2orange orbs in sky made no noise

content.detailedDescription: It was either 1970 or 1971, i'm just not sure anymore since it's been over 40 years since we seen the ufo. we were parked at a park like young people do sometimes, we were in the car. i remember looking towards the south and noticed an object i thought was a star in the sky, but this star moved. i was amazed at the quick movement and how it flew from east to west in a matter of seconds then stopped in mid-air. i remember asking my boyfriend at the time, what is that? we watched it for several minutes so it seemed. it hoovered, it flew to the east within seconds, then it went up within seconds, then back down hoovering in the sky at each direction it flew. then within a second it vanished, ascending, we didn't see it anymore. my boyfriend said "that was a ufo" and i totally agree to this day. a helicopter doesn't travel at speeds like that. if i could estimate the total length it flew in a second i would say 30 to 50 miles, then stopped in mid-air. of course people think your nuts when you tell them this, but you know i don't care. we know what we saw that clear night long ago. and to this day i know it wasn't a helicopter, airplane or search light. i've tried looking in the bible for similiar things because i want answers too. i really do not remember the feelings i had when i saw it but i wasn't scared at all just amazed. i've always wondered if anyone else ever reported a ufo at that same time. we did not report it, who would listen anyway. thank you for listening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like a rapid fast moving star that stopped and hoovered.
